system.effect: Concussion from the explosion knocks the target to the ground and turns his innards into so much ground meat. The target suffers [[1d5]] levels of Fatigue and is knocked Prone. He must immediately make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test; if he fails, he suffers Blood Loss and his Toughness characteristic is permanently reduced by 1.

description.value:
Explosive Damage to Body (Severity 5)

Concussion from the explosion knocks the target to the ground and turns his innards into so much ground meat. The target suffers [[1d5]] levels of Fatigue and is knocked Prone. He must immediately make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test; if he fails, he suffers Blood Loss and his Toughness characteristic is permanently reduced by 1.
